synopsis.text: Need a butler who can handle anything from serving tea to fending off kidnappers? Look no further than Hayate Ayasaki, the dedicated servant to teenage heiress Nagi Sanzenin. After moving into the Violet Mansion with Nagi and her maid Maria, Hayate's life is anything but ordinary. From nursing sick residents during exams to retrieving embarrassing videos and protecting briefcases full of cash, there's never a dull moment in this chaotic household. And while Hayate may be oblivious to the affections of the many cute girls around him, he always gets the job done with a smile. Join Hayate, Nagi, and the rest of the gang as they navigate the madness of their daily lives in this exciting season of Hayate no Gotoku!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
